scripts.build: esbuild `find ./js -path ./js/lib/generated -prune -o \( -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.js' \) -print` --format=esm --outdir=out --bundle --minify && yarn compile:styles --style compressed --no-source-map && cp -r js/lib/generated/qr_code_wasm out/lib
scripts.qr_code:generate: cd js/lib/generated/qr_code_wasm && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/qr_code_wasm.wasm --out-dir ./generated  --target web && cp -r generated/* ../../../../out/lib/qr_code_wasm/generated/
